rules.title: Confirm Patient Status and Identity
rules.action: Inquire about new/existing status and ask for basic identifying information (e.g., name, date of birth).
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling. Are you a new or existing patient with us today? Could I get your full name and date of birth?

rules.title: Request Info for Established Patient Chart
rules.action: Ask for a specific identifier to pull up their chart.
rules.example: Since you're an existing patient, could I please have your phone number or date of birth to pull up your chart?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status and Info Receipt
rules.condition: Patient has provided status and identifying information.
rules.action: Verbally confirm understanding of their status and receipt of data.
rules.example: Okay, thank you. You're an existing patient and I have your phone number.

rules.title: Inform and Acknowledge Chart Access
rules.action: Tell the patient you're accessing their information and manage their wait.
rules.example: Please bear with me for a moment while I access your chart.

rules.title: Verify Identity Against Chart Data
rules.action: Cross-reference provided information with chart data to confirm identity.
rules.example: Just to confirm, your address on file is [address], is that correct?

rules.title: Confirm Call Purpose and Details
rules.action: Elicit the reason for the call and gather necessary context.
rules.example: Now that I have your chart open, how can I help you today? What is the reason for your call?

rules.title: State Immediate Next Action
rules.action: Clearly communicate the next step in resolving their issue.
rules.example: Okay, I understand. I will now look for available appointments for you.

rules.title: Ask Clarifying Questions
rules.condition: Ambiguity in patient information or request.
rules.action: Pose specific questions to resolve confusion.
rules.example: Just to be clear, are you looking for an appointment for yourself or for a family member?

rules.title: Offer and Confirm Appointment Slots
rules.action: Provide concrete appointment options and wait for patient's selection.
rules.example: We have an opening on Tuesday at 10 AM or Wednesday at 2 PM. Which works best for you?

rules.title: Offer Alternative Appointment Options
rules.action: Find and propose different available times.
rules.example: No problem at all. How about later in the week, say Thursday afternoon, or next Monday morning?

rules.title: Request Preferred Pharmacy for Refill
rules.action: Ask for the patient's preferred pharmacy to send the refill to.
rules.example: Certainly, I can help with that. Which pharmacy would you like us to send the refill to?

rules.title: Request Prescribing Doctor for Refill
rules.action: Ask for the name of the prescribing doctor for the medication.
rules.example: And could you please tell me the name of the doctor who prescribed this medication?
